Description: The following statement contains a magic number: throw new InvalidRangeException<int>("Invalid input!"' 2' 50);

The following statement contains a magic number: throw new InvalidRangeException<DateTime>("Invalid date!"' new DateTime(1981' 1' 1)' DateTime.Now);
